file_content.text: We gather here today because we have had enough!
The Republic seeks to eliminate us. They want to bomb the hallowed walls of Kaas City to cinders. But we won't let them!
No military is superior, no fleet more powerful, no spy network more pervasive than ours!
If Dromund Kaas is the heart of the Empire, we are its fist. Together, we will choke the life from the Republic!
